title: "You're Chinese So I'm Unfollowing You": Racists Are Targeting Instagram Influencers
description: "Using the pandemic as an excuse for racism doesn't make it okay," said one Asian-Australian influencer. View Entire Post ›
content:
She told BuzzFeed News she's faced other kinds of online abuse before, so she's learnt to deal with the negativity.
"Any negativity that comes from another against another is a reflection of themselves, it's not any different to someone calling me a hoe for … [+1376 chars]
